content:
Hi. Is there any good document/video explaining the context from which roc started? I can see it is described as a "direct descendant of elm" but what does that mean precisely? how does it relate to elm? what was the motivation etc? :)

Thank you
@Gelu Timoficiuc https://youtu.be/ZnYa99QoznE?t=4790 is probably the best for that!
